title: Partners in curriculum
creator_credit: Diane O'Connor and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: A program which encourages the participation of teachers, students, parents and school based groups and committees in the planning and development of school curriculum. Examples of how this is happening at Mt. Clear High School, Tallangatta High School and Williamstown High School are shown. Curriculum support services are also briefly mentioned.
